content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: GetScopeOrigins path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/cdn/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/sites/{site_id}/scopes/{scope_id}/origins content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name siteid
desc a site id
in path
required true
schema
type str
name scopeid
desc a scope id
in path
required true
schema
type str
name pagerequestfirst
desc the number of items desired
in query
required false
schema
type str
name pagerequestafter
desc the cursor value after which data will be returned
in query
required false
schema
type str
name pagerequestfilter
desc sqlstyle constraint filters
in query
required false
schema
type str
name pagerequestsortby
desc sort the response by the given field
in query
required false
schema
type str
sum get all scope origins
responses
200
cdngetscopeoriginsresponse
type obj
props
paginationpageinfo
type obj
props
totalcount
type str
desc the total number of items in the dataset
haspreviouspage
type bool
format bool
desc whether or not a previous page of data exists
hasnextpage
type bool
format bool
desc whether or not another page of data is available
startcursor
type str
desc the cursor for the first item in the set of data returned
endcursor
type str
desc the cursor for the last item in the set of data returned
desc information about a paginated response

this is modeled after the graphql relay spec to support both cursor based pagination and traditional offset based pagination
results
type arr
cdnscopeorigin
type obj
props
priority
type integer
format int32
desc an origins priority to its cdn site scope

if a cdn scope is powered by more than one origin then the one with the lower priority number takes higher precedence
schemacdnorigin
type obj
props
id
type str
desc an origins unique identifier
path
type str
desc an origins path

paths default to /
hostname
type str
desc an origins hostname or ip address
port
type integer
format int32
desc the http port to connect to the origin
secureport
type integer
format int32
desc the https port to connect to the origin
dedicated
type bool
format bool
desc whether or not an origin is dedicated to a cdn site

dedicated origins cannot be used by any site other than that to which it is dedicated
siteid
type str
desc the id of the cdn site to which an origin is dedicated
desc a cdn sites origin

origins are the original sources of the data that is cached by the cdn on request
desc a relationship between a cdn sites configuration scope and an origin
desc the requested scopes origins
desc the response from a request to retrieve a cdn site scopes origins
title: 7_Configuration_GetScopeOrigins_42.json
